<xmod:CommandImage text="${1}" ImageUrl="${2}" ImageAlign="${3}">
    <Command Target="${4}" Type="${5|List,Detail|}">
        <Parameter Name="${6}" Value='${7:[[${8}]]}' />${0}
    </Command>
</xmod:CommandImage>

${6}

${7}

 Sorry. No Records Were Found ${0}

<xmod:DeleteButton text="${1:Delete}" OnClientClick="return confirm('${2:Are you sure you want to delete this record?}');">
    <Parameter Name="${3}" Value='${4:[[${5}]]}' />
</xmod:DeleteButton>
${0}

<xmod:DeleteImage AlternateText="${1:Delete}" OnClientClick="return confirm('${2:Are you sure you want to delete this record?}');" ImageUrl="${3:~/images/delete.gif}">
    <Parameter Name="${4}" Value='${5:[[${6}]]}' />
</xmod:DeleteImage>

<xmod:DeleteLink text="${1:Delete}" onclientclick="return confirm('${2:Are you sure you want to delete this record?}');">
    <Parameter Name="${3}" Value='${4:[[${5}]]}' />
</xmod:DeleteLink>

<xmod:LoadFeed
    FeedName="${1}"
    LoadingCssClass="${2}"
    LoadingImageUrl="${3}"
    Target="${4}"  >
 
    <Field Name="${5}" Value='${6:[[${7}]]}' />
</xmod:LoadFeed>

<xmod:LoadFeedImage 
    AlternateText="${1}" 
    ImageUrl="${2}" 
    FeedName="${3}" 
    Target="${4}"   >

    <Field Name="${5}" Value='${6:[[${7}]]}' />
</xmod:LoadFeedImage>
">${5:Link Text Here}
{SearchLabel} {SearchBox} {SearchButton} {SortLabel} {SortFieldList} {SortButton} Reverse {ReverseSort}

<xmod:Slideshow Id="${1}" ImageField="${2}" BasePath="${3:~/images/}" Timeout="${4:6000}" Height="${5:250}"  Width="${6:200}">
    <ListDataSource CommandText="${7:SELECT...}" />
</xmod:Slideshow>
... ... Sorry. No Records Were Found

<AddForm ClientName="${1}">
    <SelectCommand  CommandText="${2:SELECT 1}"  />
    <SubmitCommand  CommandText="${3:INSERT INTO ...}"  ${4:CommandType="StoredProcedure"}/>
    <ControlDataSource Id="${5}" CommandText="${6:SELECT ..., ... FROM ... ORDER BY ... ASC}"/>

 </AddForm>

<AddToRoles 
    Culture="locale-Id"
    StartDate="date" 
    EndDate="date"
    If="basic conditional equality expression"
    RoleNames="comma-delimited list of DNN roles"
    UserId="integer" 
 />

<AddUser 
    Approved ="${1}"
    DisplayName ='[[${2}]]'
    Username ='[[${3}]]'
    Email ='[[${4}]]'
    FirstName ='[[${5}]]'
    LastName ='[[${6}]]' 
    Password ='[[${7}]]'
    RoleNames ='[[${8}]]'
    Unit ='[[${9}]]'
    Street ='[[${10}]]'
    City ='[[${11}]]'
    PostalCode ='[[${12}]]'
    Region = '[[${13}]]'
    Country ='[[${14}]]'
    Telephone ='[[${15}]]'
    RoleNames="${16}"
    UpdatePasswordOnNextLogin ="${17|true,false|}">
        <Property Name="${18}" Value='[[${19}]]' />
</AddUser>
<CalendarImage text="${1:Select Date}"  AlternateText="${2:Select Date}" Format="${3:yyyy-MM-dd}" ImageUrl="${4:~/images/calendar.jpg}" Target="${5}" />
<xmod:ContinueImage AlternateText="${1:View Your data}" ImageUrl="${2:~/images/profile.gif}" redirect="${3:https://mysite.com/data}" RedirectMethod="${4|Get,Post|}" />

<ControlDataSource Id="${1}" CommandText="${2:SELECT ..., ... FROM ... ORDER BY ... ASC}">
    <Parameter Name="${3}" Value='${4:[[${5}]]}' DataType="${6|string,int32,int64,boolean|}" />
</ControlDataSource>

<DropDownList  Id="${1}" DataField="${2}" DataType="${3|string,int32,int64,boolean|}" DataTextField="${4}" DataValueField="${5}"
               DataSourceId="${6}" AppendDataBoundItems="${7|true,false|}" TargetDataSourceId="${8}" ParameterName="${9}"  TargetControlId="${10}"  >
    <ListItem Value="" Selected="${11}">Item1</ListItem>
    <ListItem Value="">Item2</ListItem>
</DropDownList>

<DualList Id="${1}" DataField="${2}" DataSourceId="${3}"  DataType="${4|string,int32,int64,boolean|}" DataTextField="${5}"  DataValueField="${6}" >
    <ListItem Value="#00FF00">Green</ListItem>
    <ListItem Value="#FF0000" selected="true">Red</ListItem>
    <ListItem Value="#0000FF">Blue</ListItem>
</DualList>

<EditForm ClientName="${1}">
    <SelectCommand  CommandText="${2:SELECT 1} "/>
    <SubmitCommand  CommandText="${3:INSERT INTO table_name( ) VALUES( )}" />
    <ControlDataSource Id="${4}" CommandText="${5:SELECT ..., ... FROM ... ORDER BY ... ASC}"/>

</EditForm>

<Email To="${1}" From="${2}" ReplyTo="${5}" Subject="${6}" Format="${7|HTML,Text|}" >
 
    ${8:..text, HTML and [[FieldTokens]] to make up Body of the Email...}

</Email>
<FileUpload Id="${1}" Path="${2:~/images/}" DataField="${3}" DataType="string" Extensions="${4:gif,jpg}" UploadButtonText="${5:Upload}" UseUniqueFileName="${6|true,false|}" />

<ListBox Id="${1}" DataSourceId="${2}" DataField="${3}" DataTextField="${4}"  DataValueField="${5}" DataType="${6|string,int32,int62,boolean|}" SelectionMode="${7|single,multiple|}" SelectedItemsSeparator="${8:|}" >
    <ListItem Value="#00FF00">Green</ListItem>
    <ListItem Value="#FF0000" selected="true">Red</ListItem>
    <ListItem Value="#0000FF">Blue</ListItem>    
</ListBox>

<Panel  Id="${1}"  ShowRoles="${2:Editor}" ShowIf="${3:Expression}" >
    ${4:...HTML, text, and Control Tags...}
</Panel>
<RadioButton  Id="${1}" text="${2}" DataField="${3}" DataType="boolean" DataValueField="${4}" Checked="${5|true,false|}"  />

<RadioButtonList Id="${1}"  DataSourceId="${2}"  DataTextField="${3}"  DataValueField="${4}" DataType="${5|string,int32,int64,boolean|}">
    <ListItem Value="#00FF00">Green</ListItem>
    <ListItem Value="#FF0000" selected="true">Red</ListItem>
    <ListItem Value="#0000FF">Blue</ListItem>
</RadioButtonList>

<SilentPost  If="${1:expression}" Url="${2}">
    <Field Name="${3}"  Value='[[${4}]]' />
    <Field Name="${5}"  Value='[[${6}]]' />
</SilentPost>

<Tabstrip HoverBackColor="${1}" HoverForeColor="${2}" SelectedBackColor="${3}" SelectedForeColor="${4}">

    <tab text="${5:tab1}">
        ${6:...HTML/text Content...}
    </tab>
    <tab text="${7:tab2}">
        ${8}
    </tab>
</Tabstrip>
<TextArea Id="${1}" DataField="${2}" DataType="string" Height="${3:400}" Width="${4:600}" Placeholder="${5:Placeholder Text...}" />
<TextBox Id="${1}" DataField="${2}" DataType="string" Width="${3:200}" Placeholder="${4:Placeholder Text...}" />

<UpdateUser 
    Approved ="${1}"
    DisplayName ='[[${2}]]'
    Username ='[[${3}]]'
    Email ='[[${4}]]'
    FirstName ='[[${5}]]'
    LastName ='[[${6}]]' 
    Password ='[[${7}]]'
    RoleNames ='[[${8}]]'
    Unit ='[[${9}]]'
    Street ='[[${10}]]'
    City ='[[${11}]]'
    PostalCode ='[[${12}]]'
    Region = '[[${13}]]'
    Country ='[[${14}]]'
    Telephone ='[[${15}]]'
    UpdatePasswordOnNextLogin ="${16|true,false|}">
        <Property Name="${17}" Value='[[${18}]]' />
</UpdateUser>
<Validate  text="${1}" Type="CheckBox" Target="${2}" MustBeChecked ="${3|true,false|}" Message="${4:Please make selection}" />
<Validate text="${1}" Type="Compare" Target="${2}" CompareTarget="${3}" Message="${4:The fields don't match}"  />
<Validate text="${1}" Type="Email" Target="${2}" Message="${3:Please enter a valid email address}"/>

<Validate text="${1}" Type="Range" Target="${2}" MinimumValue="${3:1}" MaximumValue="${4:10}" DataType="${5|string,integer,double,date,currency|}" Message="${6:You can only enter values between x and y ...}" />
<Validate text="${1}" Type="RegEx" Target="${2}" ValidationExpression="${3}" Message="${4:The value must be in the format: }" />
<Validate  text="${1}" Type="Required" Target="${2}" Message="${3:You must enter something}" />
<Validate Type="XML" target="${1}" message="${2:Please enter well-formed XML}" />

</SqlCommand>

<Twillo AccountSid="${1}" AuthToken="${2}" From="${3}" To="${4}" PerformAction="${5}" Event="${6|PostSubmit,PreSubmit|}" >
${7:Text Message}
</Twillo>

<Command runat="server" Target="${1}" Type="${2|List,Detail|}">

        ${9}

body:
<AddItemTemplate>
<xmod:AddForm runat="server">
    <SubmitCommand CommandText="" />

    <Label For="txtFieldOne" Text="Field One:" />
    <TextBox Id="txtFieldOne" DataField="FieldOne" DataType="string" />

    <AddButton Text="Add" />   <CancelButton Text="Cancel" />
</xmod:AddForm>
</AddItemTemplate>

body:
<%@ Control Language="vb" AutoEventWireup="false" Inherits="KnowBetter.XModPro.FormBase" %>
<%@ Register Assembly="KnowBetter.XModPro.Web.Controls" Namespace="KnowBetter.XModPro.Web.Controls.Form" TagPrefix="xmod" %>

<xmod:FormView runat="server">

<AddItemTemplate>
<xmod:AddForm runat="server">
    <SubmitCommand CommandText="" />

    <Label For="txtFieldOne" Text="Field One:" />
    <TextBox Id="txtFieldOne" DataField="FieldOne" DataType="string" />

    <AddButton Text="Add" />   <CancelButton Text="Cancel" />
</xmod:AddForm>
</AddItemTemplate>

<AddSuccessTemplate>
<xmod:AddSuccess runat="server">
    <ItemTemplate>
        Add Success Template Text Here
    </ItemTemplate>
</xmod:AddSuccess>
</AddSuccessTemplate>

<EditItemTemplate>
<xmod:EditForm runat="server">
    <SelectCommand CommandText="SELECT 1" />
    <Submitcommand CommandText="" />

    <Label For="txtFieldOne" Text="Field One:" />
    <TextBox Id="txtFieldOne" DataField="FieldOne" />

    <UpdateButton Text="Update" />   <CancelButton Text="Cancel" />
    <Textbox Id="txtKey" DataField="KeyFieldName" DataType="int32" Visible="False" />
</xmod:EditForm>
</EditItemTemplate>

<EditSuccessTemplate>
<xmod:EditSuccess runat="server">
    <ItemTemplate>
        Edit Success Template Text Here
    </ItemTemplate>
</xmod:EditSuccess>
</EditSuccessTemplate>

</xmod:FormView>
FullForm_ascx.description: XMP Form Control - ASCX Full Form Template

body:
<SqlCommand CommandText="${1}" CommandType="${2}" ConnectionString="${3}"  PerformAction="${4}" Event="${5|PostSubmit,PreSubmit|}" >
    <Parameter Name="${6}" Value="${7}" DataType="${9|string,int32,int62,boolean|}" />
</SqlCommand>

<Twillo AccountSid="${1}" AuthToken="${2}" From="${3}" To="${4}" PerformAction="${5}" Event="${6|PostSubmit,PreSubmit|}" >
${7:Text Message}
</Twillo>

fx Inline Edit Form_ascx.description: Form.X  Control - ASCX Inline edit Form Template

body:
<fx:AddButton runat="server" Text="${1:Add}">
    <Parameter Name="${2}" Value='${3:<%#Eval("Values")("${4:Token Name Here}")%>}' DataType="${5|string,int32,int62,boolean|}" />
</fx:AddButton>

<fx:EditButton runat="server" Text="${1:Edit}">
    <Parameter Name="${2}" Value='${3:<%#Eval("Values")("${4:Token Name Here}")%>}' DataType="${5|string,int32,int62,boolean|}" />
</fx:EditButton>
